monster.name: Aberrant
languages: understands Common and Terran but can't speak

trait.name: Chrysalis Aberration
entries: The aberrant has one of the following special features, determined randomly by rolling a {@dice d20} or chosen by the GM. See the Chrysalis Aberration table in the threat description.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aberrant makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw, or two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.
